到達目標:
Students will be able to choose a topic for an essay.
Students will be able to read academic articles and take notes.
Students will be able to use the write/edit cycle to complete their essays.
特記事項:
この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。

本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景:
This course is primarily for students who are going to study overseas and want to practice writing an essay in a similar style to what they would expect in an overseas university. The students will choose their own topics, research a reading list, read the items on this list, take notes and write a first draft. Then, after feedback, they will rewrite the first draft to produce a final draft.
Due to the small size of this class, students will get a lot of one-on-one time with the teacher. There is a large amount of teacher support.

第4回: How to choose what to read.
第5回: How to take notes on your reading list.
第9回: Writing a plan for the first draft.
